DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : FORTUNE PETROLEUM BUYS INTO TEXAS GAS FIELD
DOC.TEXT: Fortune Petroleum Corp . announced that it will acquire a 50 % leasehold in the Brooklyn Union La Rosa natural_gas field in Refugio County , Tex.Fortune will pay $ 750 # 000 for the lease from its $ 10-million line_of_credit extended by Bank One in Texas . Agoura Hills-based Fortune is an independent oil and gas exploration and production company . The company ' s principal properties are located in Texas and California . Fortune is in the midst of a multiyear plan to acquire natural_gas producing properties .
